sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Rain</radical> on a <radical>rice paddy</radical> means only one thing... <kanji>thunder</kanji>! Get off the rice paddy! There's nothing but you to attract the thunder!
meaningInfo: Imagine hearing the thunder as you run. It is getting closer.
readingMnemonic: You can't run fast enough to escape the <kanji>thunder</kanji> so you hitch a <reading>ri</reading>de (<ja>らい</ja>) from someone driving by.
readingInfo: Thank goodness, that was a close one. The guy who picks you up is named Ryan, though he likes it if you call him <reading>Ry</reading> (<ja>らい</ja>).
